I'm out 20+ years of CS, I'm done its gone to me like a exwife, started out great but just went down hill with an addiction to meth. Like an addiction to appease all groups and stupid citizens. No longer is it for a single class of game style now its the same force feed crap Activision and EA have been shoveling down our throats. Literally removing CS:GO off my account. Swear to god if Half-Life: ALYX is like this or nothing true to the story I'm deleting my steam account and selling everything. I'll just play indie games direct from seller. 
 reviewed here several years ago it was a great system for rank because it was based on individual performance then it went to socialist grading system of teams ability. sure I'll carry everyone fuck it or be forced to join a clan to keep my rank. Well after that It was non stop skin crap and hackers. Kids throwing games and steam not preventing hackers because they know they can make sales off the hackers buying more accounts. Then the glitches of each update and never fixing vulnerabilities. HOW the hell does CCleaner affect a stupid game like this? Why should I uninstall it??? Well I did I kept with it for awhile I got rid of it. Okay cool still taking it easy listening to kids talk stupid incoherent English well what ever, then they start throwing games and don't care about rank. Well we can deal with all that, right? Valve: Oh look Fortnites making lots of money(not from PC) lets mirror that garbage as shit to sell stupid citizens of the world the mindless drones that wanted a place to just shoot some shit, no strategies or efforts. I'll be as anti steam as I am anti EA, EPIC, you sell out $*@&s.
Everyone cheats in prime and non prime now this game is fucking garbage fix it holy fuck this game is a cheater game now
